src:
Fuerte choque múltiple en la ruta 51 causó caos vehicular
El hecho ocurrió poco antes de las 10. Personal policial continúa trabajando en el lugar.
05 Nov 2019 by Policiales
Gran caos vehicular ocasionó en la ruta 51, un violento choque múltiple que involucró al menos a cuatrovehículos.
Ocurrió alrededor de las 10 y por fortuna, no hubo heridos de gravedad. Los rodados que protagonizaron el siniestro son dos utilitarios Fiat Fiorino y una camioneta Ford Ranger que circulaban en idéntico sentido, y una Toyota Hilux, que circulaba en sentido contrario al resto de los vehículos.



Según trascendió, al menos seis personas viajaban en los rodados y dos de ellas sufrieron golpes. Sin embargo, no presentaban heridas graves.
Personal policial de la Comisaría 12º se hizo cargo del procedimiento.
text:
Strong multiple crash on Route 51 caused vehicular chaos
The incident occurred shortly before 10 am. Police personnel continue to work there.
05 Nov 2019 by Policiales
Great vehicle chaos caused on Route 51, a violent multiple crash that involved at least four vehicles.
It happened around 10 and fortunately, there were no serious injuries. The wheels that starred in the incident are two Fiat Fiorino utilities and a Ford Ranger truck that circulated in the same direction, and a Toyota Hilux, which circulated in the opposite direction to the rest of the vehicles.



As it transpired, at least six people were traveling on the road and two of them were hit. However, they had no serious injuries.
Police personnel of the 12th Police Station took over the procedure.
